backend/main.mo: Defines types and logic for user profiles, location tracking, SOS alerts, and authorization checks for ambulance and police roles.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains pre-written one‑sentence summaries for all frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS variables and light/dark theme styling for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Leaflet assets and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, profile setup, and routing to ambulance or police interfaces.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component with attribution branding.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header showing branding, share controls, user info, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/LinkDomainInfoPa: Dialog explaining the app’s shareable URL and requirements for custom domain configuration.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Login screen that prompts users to authenticate via Internet Identity with ambulance and police role visuals. Includes a single login button and basic status handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form for users to enter their name and select ambulance or police role, then save their profile via a mutation. Handles submission errors and displays validation feedback.
frontend/src/components/RealtimeMap.tsx: Leaflet-based map component that initializes a map, updates center and markers, and displays custom icons for ambulance, police, and SOS markers. Includes error handling for tile loading and map initialization.
frontend/src/components/ShareAppLinkCont: Provides a button to copy the app's share URL with clipboard and fallback behaviors. Shows feedback when copying succeeds or when fallback mode is required.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes. Initializes access control using a secret URL parameter.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and identity restoration. Exposes identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, location updates, SOS actions, and radius-based location fetching using the backend actor. Handles mutations, caching, refetching, and backend error normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes, including gradients and emergency colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceInterface.ts: Ambulance UI that tracks geolocation, sends periodic updates, and manages SOS activation with timers and backend sync.
frontend/src/pages/PoliceInterface.tsx: Police UI that tracks officer location, displays nearby ambulances and SOS alerts, filters stale data, and plays alert sounds.
frontend/src/types/leaflet-global.d.ts: Provides a minimal global TypeScript declaration for window.L used by Leaflet.
frontend/src/utils/getShareUrl.ts: Returns the full current browser URL for sharing purposes.
frontend/src/utils/locationRefresh.ts: Defines shared timing constants and formatting helpers for distances and radii.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with theme extensions, color bindings to CSS variables, plugins, and dark-mode support.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature lists, pending requests, and notes for the ongoing fix tasks.
